synopsis.text: Mamiâ€™s heart flutters for the football sensation of her school, Ishida-senpai. As Valentine's Day approaches, she yearns to express her affection through a gift of chocolate. Luckily, her friend Kouko reveals a secret: the existence of a mystical "Magical Chocolate" that promises to make the recipient fall in love. Will this enchanted treat be the key to unlocking Mami's dream of capturing Ishida-senpai's heart? Prepare for a magical rollercoaster of romance and suspense in this heartwarming anime tale!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
